long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Only getting options for having your websites as light mode or dark mode is boring. Make the websites you visit look beautiful. Make all the websites look like what you want them to look like. Set any image that you like as the background for sites you visit.
